events.message: I reported the auto accident that occurred last night involving my car and another vehicle at the intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial accident details and vehicle damage report.
An agent was assigned to handle the case and will be your point of contact going forward for this auto accident claim.
We have acknowledged your claim and appreciate your prompt reporting following the vehicle collision incident.
Please provide your driver's license, vehicle registration, and photos of the car damage to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents, including the police report and photos, have been submitted to support the collision claim.
The investigation team has started reviewing all submitted evidence and accident details related to your vehicle.
The investigation has been completed, confirming the liability and extent of damages from the reported car accident.
We have proposed a settlement amount that covers the repair costs and associated expenses for your vehicle damage.
You provided positive feedback regarding the responsiveness and clarity of communication during the claim process.
Your claim was approved successfully, and we are moving forward to issue the payment covering the repairs.
Payment for the approved settlement has been issued to your bank account to cover all vehicle repair expenses.
The claim has been officially closed following the successful payment and completion of your vehicle repair.
This auto accident claim case has been archived in our records for any future reference or auditing purposes.
